summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1458, for the improvement of Westlake Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from Denny Way to Mercer Street, by grading and regarding the same, under Ordinance No. 15709 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
